data.name: Song of Calamity I - Music, Paranormal Events & Sinister Fairies
data.detailed_description:
Song of Calamity - Part I:
Music, Paranormal Events & Sinister Fairies

...is a role playing game inspired by classic turn based retro JRPGs, like Persona and Final Fantasy.

The Plot

The orphan girl Calamity is a child of two worlds. Half human, half fae, she is endowed with supernatural powers. Through her special eyes, that can see more than should be possible for a mortal, she is able to freely traverse between the human world and the fairy realm by tearing open temporary portals, called rifts.
Together with her faithful and mysterious talking cat Maurice, she sets out on a journey to find her place in the world and to learn more about her puzzling past.
Not only are there dark fairies to fight, that are manifestations of traumata, addictions and mental illnesses of the human subconscious, but she also founds a sweet punk rock band along the way.
United by music and the goal to achieve something in the tough music business, they are confronted with all sorts of strange events of cosmic scale that they can only overcome by being together.

Features

  • Original soundtrack composed by Kevin Wolf, Sleipnir Dreamware and friends.
  • Fantastical, dark and colorful artstyle with heavy themes of German expressionism & psychedelic imagery.
  • Experience a unique coming of age story with elements of Gothic, Punk, Horror, Mystery and SciFi!
  • Travel between the human world Midgard, the fairy realm behind the veil and other strange places.
  • Find new friends that not only help you in battle, but also play various instruments in the band you are forming in the human world! Find the best members to create your sound to win the grand upcoming battle of the bands!
  • Battle manifested enemies in the fairy realm, with a turn order battle system where your actions determine the turn order of the next one!
  • Connect your phone to the game to receive mysterious messages from the strange fairy realm
  • Darkness or light? Your decisions determine which kind of friends you attract.

More info:

  • Languages: English, German
  • Find up to 5 playable characters!
  • Beat 3 tough bosses (plus 4 secret hidden ones! Psst!)
  • Find 10 collectible, fully illustrated comic pages!
  • Experience the game in classic retro 4:3 resolution. Widescreen users get to see extra special animated border videos for each area!

Music

Not only is music one of the main themes of the game, there was also a heavy focus on creating an amazing and unique soundtrack! Together with bands of many styles, the OST is a spectacular mix of music. Expect to get blown away by tracks inspired by metal, rock, alternative, jazz, elektro, psytrance, orchestral, hip-hop, industrial and many more genres!

data.short_description: A pixel-art-JRPG about the young woman Calamity, who travels into the strange world behind the veil to find more than she bargained for. Beat up dark fairies, explore a colorful and dark wonderland, meet talking mushrooms, cute cats and lots of new magical friends!

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
